mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (reviewid, userid, matchid, goodsid, orderid, reviewdate, title, content, rating, grantedpoints, filename, filesize) VALUES (#{reviewid}, #{userid}, #{matchid}, #{goodsid}, #{orderid}, #{reviewdate}, #{title}, #{content}, #{rating}, #{grantedpoints}, #{filename}, #{filesize})
INSERT INTO pointhistory (userid, pointtype, pointsource, pointamount, pointcreationdate) VALUES (#{userid}, '적립', #{pointSource}, #{pointAmount}, NOW())
